sentences.en: The area is of great botanical interest.
sentences.cn: 该地区很有植物学研究价值。

sentences.en: 200,000 specimens of fungus are kept at the Komarov Botanical Institute.
sentences.cn: 20万个真菌标本被保存在科马罗夫植物研究所。

sentences.en: Plants are grouped into botanical "families" that have certain characteristics in common.
sentences.cn: 具有某些共同特点的植物被归为植物学的科。
